chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall (n : nat) (x : nat -> nat), (forall z1 z2 : nat, z1 < S n -> z2 < S n -> z1 <> z2 -> CoPrime (x z1) (x z2)) -> (forall z : nat, z < S n -> x z > 0) -> CoPrime (prod n x) (x n)

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
prod = fun (n : nat) (x : nat -> nat) => nat_rec (fun _ : nat => nat) 1 (fun n0 Hrecn : nat => x n0 * Hrecn) n : nat -> (nat -> nat) -> nat Arguments prod _%nat_scope _%function_scope
CoPrime = fun a b : nat => gcd (Z.of_nat a) (Z.of_nat b) 1 : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments CoPrime (_ _)%nat_scope
prodBig1 : forall (n : nat) (x : nat -> nat), (forall z : nat, z < n -> x z > 0) -> prod n x > 0
sameProd : forall (n : nat) (x1 x2 : nat -> nat), (forall z : nat, z < n -> x1 z = x2 z) -> prod n x1 = prod n x2
dec.decDeMorgan : forall (N : nat) (P : nat -> Prop), (forall n : nat, P n \/ ~ P n) -> (exists x : nat, x < N /\ P x) < -> ~ (forall x : nat, x < N -> ~ P x)
lt_wf_rec : forall (n : nat) (P : nat -> Set), (forall n0 : nat, (forall m : nat, m < n0 -> P m) -> P n0) -> P n
lt_wf_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : nat -> Prop), (forall n0 : nat, (forall m : nat, m < n0 -> P m) -> P n0) -> P n
gt_wf_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : nat -> Prop), (forall n0 : nat, (forall m : nat, n0 > m -> P m) -> P n0) -> P n
gt_wf_rec : forall (n : nat) (P : nat -> Set), (forall n0 : nat, (forall m : nat, n0 > m -> P m) -> P n0) -> P n
primepropdiv : forall n : nat, n > 1 -> (forall q : nat, Prime q -> Divides q n -> q * q > n) -> Prime n
le_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : nat -> Prop), P n -> (forall m : nat, n <= m -> P m -> P (S m)) -> forall n0 : nat, n <= n0 -> P n0
S_pred : forall n m : nat, m < n -> n = S (Init.Nat.pred n)
nat_rec : forall P : nat -> Set, P 0 -> (forall n : nat, P n -> P (S n)) -> forall n : nat, P n
nat_rect : forall P : nat -> Type, P 0 -> (forall n : nat, P n -> P (S n)) -> forall n : nat, P n
nat_ind : forall P : nat -> Prop, P 0 -> (forall n : nat, P n -> P (S n)) -> forall n : nat, P n
sqrdivbound : forall n d : nat, Divides d n -> exists x : nat, Divides x n /\ x * x <= n /\ (x = d \/ d * x = n)
lt_n_S : forall n m : nat, n < m -> S n < S m
lt_S_n : forall n m : nat, S n < S m -> n < m
Nat.induction : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> A 0 -> (forall n : nat, A n -> A (S n)) -> forall n : nat, A n
Nat.case_analysis : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> A 0 -> (forall n : nat, A (S n)) -> forall n : nat, A n
Nat.lt_lt_succ_r : forall n m : nat, n < m -> n < S m
gcd = fun (x y : Z) (d : nat) => common_div x y d /\ (forall e : nat, common_div x y e -> e <= d) : Z -> Z -> nat -> Prop Arguments gcd (_ _)%Z_scope _%nat_scope
f_equal_nat : forall (B : Type) (f : nat -> B) (x y : nat), x = y -> f x = f y
Nat.lt_pred_lt_succ : forall n m : nat, Nat.pred n < m -> n < S m
modulo.moda0_exp_compat : forall (a : Z) (n : nat), n > 0 -> modulo.Mod a 0 n -> forall m : nat, m > 0 -> modulo.Mod (exp.Exp a m) 0 n
Acc_intro : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (x : A), (forall y : A, R y x -> Acc R y) -> Acc R x
le_lt_n_Sm : forall n m : nat, n <= m -> n < S m
lt_n_Sm_le : forall n m : nat, n < S m -> n <= m
lt_le_S : forall n m : nat, n < m -> S n <= m
gt_trans_S : forall n m p : nat, S n > m -> m > p -> n > p
gt_n_S : forall n m : nat, n > m -> S n > S m
gt_S_n : forall n m : nat, S m > S n -> m > n
